name: Flag of Equestria
description:
The flag of Equestria from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. It depicts Princess Celestia and Princess Luna, the diarchy of Equestria, flying around the sun and moon, the celestial bodies that they respectively control each day.

This flag design was chosen out of three potential designs by the Manechat Discord server. They, along with their allies, would help maintain this flag as one of their pieces throughout the event.
